name: OYO 91207 Pondok Jepun Bali
address: Perum. Pd. Kampial Permai Jl. Dharmawangsa No.5, Benoa, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Booked online, paid with card, drove one hour to the property and when I arrive there they say booking is canceled and property is full. Avoid this place at all costs. They take no responsibility for their actions. As you can see from the other reviews they dont know how to manage their bookings and constantly overbook people and charge more. They should be banned from booking
review 2: Its a very nice place to stay. They have a very comfy and clean room.. the service is great, ask the price to the owner first, you could call through their CP number cause sometimes the price in some apps got a little bit different than the actual price, but overall its a good place to stayüëç
review 3: SCAMMERS!  Why does OYO allow these scammers on their platform!  Dishonest!  Avoid !   I paid online, and when I arrived they wanted more money!
review 4: Arrived at place, they said overbooked and did not give me my room. Wasted money traveling there.

name: Ayam Bakar Bali Tulen Kampial
address: Jl. Dharmawangsa No.195, Benoa, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
If you put this into the Buzzfeed ‚Äúworth it or not?‚Äù, this place will absolutely crack it.
The food is super delicious at it price range, the sambal also really good - it‚Äôs not that spicy but really flavor-full.

The only minus is there‚Äôs some flies in the place, if you‚Äôre okay with that (like me), this place is a real go-to, or you can just use online delivery.
review 2:
Ayam Bakar Bali Tulen Kampial is a fantastic spot for anyone craving delicious grilled chicken. The chicken itself is the star of the show - perfectly cooked with a smoky charcoal flavor that's truly mouthwatering.

The prices are very reasonable, making it a great option for both locals and tourists.  Be prepared to wait a bit for your food, though, as they seem to grill everything fresh to order. This wait is definitely worth it for the delicious and authentic taste.
review 3:
Not a fancy restaurants with a tasty roasted chicken. It is located by the street and easy to spot.

Really love the roasted chicken here with its authentic sambal (chili sauce). The chicken is served with two types of sambals, but the one with lemongrass is so delicious.

I do not really recommend the ayam geprek (smashed chicken) because the taste tends too general and not really appetizing.

Price-wise, quiet reasonable with the taste and facility. This restaurants also has some franchise it the other areas in Bali.
review 4: Delicious baked chicken. The taste is balance, sweet & spicy. Well baked. Affordable price.
review 5:
Always buying my favorite dishes here
Ayam Bakar Madu is the best one and with 2 kind of delicious sambal
Recommended!

review 1: It was a great stay. The villa was very clean, Andri as the host was very nice and helpful. The location is very good, it's easy to find food and close with nusa dua beach
review 2: Good for the price paid, but needs maintenance, very noisy and lots of flies!

name: Nasi Uduk Ayam Bakar Madu Canaha
address: Benoa, South Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Great dish! Nasi Uduk Ayam Bakar was perfect! The package was tidy, the sambals excellent, and the price affordable to cheap. Small warong with friendly owner. Limited parking space and tables.
review 2:
Traditional Java cooking.
Excellent foods, great taste!
We would definitely repeat.
review 3: Don't judge the book by it's cover. Well, you have to try the food fisrt, then you can judge by yourself. The "Ayam Bakar Madu" was delicious, mixed it with 3 kinds of sambal, especially sambal kencur. What a combination! And don't forget to order jahe susu, then thank me later.
review 4: Great place, lovely family. And the Nasi Uduk is awesome. You must try.
review 5: Nice place, price of the food are acceptable and very good

name: Sewa Mobil Bali
address: Kampial, Perumahan Giri Mandala No.6, Nusa Dua, South Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: We hired Wayan Ludra for multiple trips and to take us to lesser known places in Bali. We were very impressed with his professionalism and dependability. He is very personable and accommodating, and if course knows a lot about the island and helped us with our itinerary. I rate him 5 stars on all areas. Hire him, you won't regret it!
review 2: Wonderfull service, new vehicle, clean. And the driver was very kind, and help us to plan our trip because several plan need to changes due to weather. I will use this travel again when i come back to Bali. Thank you
review 3:
Read so much good review & decided to book from cosmo during our trip to bali. Unfortunately we didnt get wayan as our driver that people‚Äôa rave about but instead a guy name pak komang who he mentioned has 20years experience as a driver in bali. He‚Äôs spoiled our mood with his sour face everyday & forcing us to go to the place that he suggesting. If we decide not to go then he will automatically be less friendly & gave us silent treatment. Other than that, every single place we have to find him & he even asked us to walk to parking lot which sometimes quite far as we have kids it is difficult to cross busy road.

We went to uluwatu around 5+pm to watch the beautiful sunset but before able to watch the sunset the driver call us & asked are we done yet because the traffic gonna be bad on the way back to seminyak later. Hence, we werent able to watch the sunset just because he cannot handle driving in heavy traffic.

This is the fifth time we went to bali & we had a great time at mara river but after checking out & stayed in seminyak we hire the driver so it will be easier for us family to move around for the next three day but everything changed.

We got so much things to complaint but it‚Äôs gonna be really long. He even dare to scam our money by dealing with a shop to charge us extra 100,000 rupiah from the price we have to pay, what an unhonest person. Bottomline just AVOID, CANCEL or CHANGE driver if you got pak komang!
review 4: Wayan is the best driver/guide you could hope for in Bali! He‚Äôs punctual, polite, friendly, and most importantly very responsible. If you want to have a safe and fun time in Bali, he‚Äôs the guy you wanna hit up for sure!!
review 5:
I have been using cosmos service since 20 years ago. The owner Pak Wayan, is a very honest and experienced driver which has established his business from 2 cars to 29 vehicles prior COVID and reduced to 15 cars and drivers due to COVID. His business still very strong because of his great work ethic and excellent customer service. Very reasonable price and all his cars are new and clean with strong air condition.

I highly recommend COSMOS car rental that always reliable, honest and experienced. I‚Äôll not hire any other car rental with driver except COSMOS. Thank you Pak Wayan for making my children and my trip in Bali such a stress free and memorable one. Your services are amazing! The amount of time you waited for my arrival and didn‚Äôt even charge me extra, was a very generous gesture. Thank you that really give me a piece of mind knowing you‚Äôll be there waiting till my arrival regardless of my flight delayed.

Keep up the amazing work COSMOS

name: Warung Be Fish
address: Jl. Dharmawangsa Kampial Nusa Dua No.333x, Benoa, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
The  Indonesian food
Special for  fish soup
And  Bali fish sauce
Friendly and local price
The  variant menu
Not only  Bali  sauce
Special  Manado sauce
review 2:
Looking for a place to stop for lunch or dinner? This place could be an option. It provides set menu (package) of fishes, and grilled chicken, as many other options available.

The owner also set the place into two main area, with and without Air Conditioner. The Aircon Room tables and chairs set as Class Room, ready for group meetings, provided with sound system and projector. No additional fees for using the facilities, just order the F&B.

Several toilets and praying room also available. So if you are on tour in Bali, definitely you can stop by here and have a break.
review 3: The place is comfortable and clean. Ordered rice, fried chicken, tofu, boiled egg with sauce, and fish soup. All the menu are delicous but the fish soup was not really fresh, expected better actually.
review 4: Good taste, free parking. Easy to reach this restaurant
review 5: During Bali visit, We spent some time at Warung Be Fish and had lunch. Food was delicious and cold tea was good. Our driver Mr. Wahyu took us there.
